sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import projectsData from '../data/projects'; export default function Projects() { const [status, setStatus] = useState('All'); const list = projectsData.filter(p => status === 'All' ? true : p.status === status); return (

Projects & Budget Transparency

{list.map((p)=> ( ))}
Project Department Budget Status Timeline
{p.title}
{p.description}
 {p.department} ₱{p.budget.toLocaleString()} {p.status} {p.startDate} – {p.endDate || '—'}
); }
